author: Warrior_pi
text: こんにちはルシアちゃん。 まず、これのいくつかが適切に翻訳されていない場合は申し訳ありません。 日本語は私の母国語ではなく、英語は母国語なので、Google翻訳を使用しています。 でも日本語を勉強しています。 とにかく、私はあなたのチャンネルをYouTubeの最もかわいい瞬間のビデオから見つけました、そして私が言うかもしれませんが、あなたは間違いなく愛らしいです。  Hololive ENを使用した場合でも、女の子がこのトレンドを開始し、人気を高めているのは驚くべきことです。 今後ともよろしくお願い申し上げます。素晴らしい一日をお過ごしください。 アメリカからずっと。

author: Amai Ta. Yume
text:
I managed to meet her 30 minutes later. School time was so busy. Her 3D is amazing. It's not detailed, but it's clear and crisp. It looks like the live2D mode, but you know, seeing all kinds of angles around her was so satisfying to watch. Knowing all sides of her literally and closely. Tilting the neck was a bit scary, but it was also cute. Only Rushia can make scary things so cute! I had a bit of an eye fetish so I always stare at her eyes, it was a job well done for a 3D model in front of the livestream. I am super impressed by the model all in all, even if I prefer the 2D because I can see her expression more. Her mouth bugs out most of the time, but she's still cute.

Then again, thank you again for the wonderful stream. It's kinda hard sometimes becase some of my chat aren't even registering when I see it which is a youtube problem, but when it does register later on, I've been listening and trying to get context out of it. Listening to rushia was also a learning experience to learn new words of Nihonggo and I am proud of that.

All in all, good night Rushia, please take care, the fans wants to see you again! I want to be with you again! Take care! Boin' boin' <3
